Package org.modelio.api.ui

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IModelioDialog  
    UIColor Deprecated
    UIFont Deprecated
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ModelioDialog
    Dialog template that has : a header with : a left image, modifiable with ModelioDialog.setTitleLeftImage(Image) a bold title, set with ModelioDialog.setTitle(String) a logo image displayed on the right side, set with ModelioDialog.setLogoImage(Image) a message, set with ModelioDialog.setMessage(String). a user defined content area defined with IModelioDialog.createContentArea(Composite).
    ModelioWizardDialog
    Version of eclipse's WizardDialog using ModelioDialog instead of TitleAreaDialog.
    ModelioWizardDialog.PageContainerFillLayout
    A layout for a container which includes several pages, like a notebook, wizard, or preference dialog.
